short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding standalone Arweave native URL support for chromium based browsers without installing Arweave in your machine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you don't want to install and run Arweave locally on your machine and want to browse Arweave native URLs then this extension is for you.

Contribute: https://github.com/warengonzaga/arweave-support-extension
Sponsor: https://github.com/sponsors/warengonzaga
